title: User Registration via Email
description: Verify that a user can register using a valid email address and password, receive a verification email, and successfully verify their account.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Input a valid email address and password
Submit the registration form
Check that a verification email is sent to the provided email address
Simulate clicking the verification link in the email
Verify that the user's email is marked as verified and account setup page is shown

title: User Registration via Google OAuth
description: Verify that a user can register and log in using Google OAuth seamlessly with profile setup afterwards.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Click the 'Sign in with Google' button
Authenticate using valid Google credentials
Check that the user is logged in and prompted to complete profile setup if first time

title: Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that a registered user can login successfully with correct email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid registered email and password
Click the login button
Verify login is successful and dashboard is displayed

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails gracefully when user enters incorrect email or password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid email or password combination
Click the login button
Verify that an error message 'Invalid credentials' is displayed and login does not succeed

title: Password Recovery via Email
description: Verify that users can request a password reset email and reset their password successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Click on 'Forgot Password' link
Enter a registered email and submit
Verify that a password reset email is sent
Simulate clicking on password reset link in the email
Enter and confirm new valid password
Verify that password has been reset and user can log in with new password

title: Subscribe to Paid Plan via Stripe Checkout
description: Verify that a user can subscribe to a paid plan using the Stripe checkout process, including payment success and subscription activation.

steps.description: Log in as a valid user
Navigate to the subscription plans page
Select a paid subscription plan and proceed to checkout
Complete payment using valid Stripe test card details
Verify that payment is processed successfully
Verify that the user's subscription status is updated to active

title: Free Trial Activation and Expiry Handling
description: Verify that user activating free trial gets full features during trial period and is restricted once trial expires.

steps.description: Register a new user
Activate free trial plan
Verify full platform features are accessible during trial
Simulate trial expiry by moving system date beyond trial period
Verify trial features become restricted and user is prompted for subscription

title: PDF Reader - Text Selection and Annotation
description: Verify that user can open a PDF document in the study room, select text, and add annotations which are saved.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to study room
Open an uploaded PDF document
Select a portion of text in the PDF
Add an annotation to the selected text
Verify that annotation is saved and visible on reloading the document

title: AI Flashcard Generation from PDF
description: Verify that user can select text in PDF and trigger AI-based flashcard generation, receiving relevant flashcards.

steps.description: Open PDF reader and highlight text or passage
Trigger AI flashcard generation from selected text
Verify relevant flashcards are generated and available for review

title: Flashcards - Spaced Repetition and Performance Tracking
description: Verify that flashcards support spaced repetition study mode and user performance data is recorded and shown.

steps.description: Access flashcards study section
Study flashcards using spaced repetition sessions
Mark cards as known or unknown
Verify that flashcard review frequency adapts based on user input
Verify user performance analytics are updated and displayed

title: Quiz System with Timers and Immediate Feedback
description: Verify that quizzes function correctly with timed questions, immediate feedback on answers, and analytics by category.

steps.description: Navigate to quiz section and select a quiz category
Start timed quiz
Answer multiple-choice questions within time limit
Verify immediate feedback is shown after each answer
Verify quiz analytics by category are shown after quiz completion

title: Traffic Signs Library - Search and Categorization
description: Verify that users can browse the traffic signs library, filter by categories, and search signs by name or type.

steps.description: Navigate to traffic signs library
Use category filters to browse signs
Perform a search query by sign name or type
Verify relevant signs are displayed according to filters and search terms

title: Traffic Signs Quizzes and Progress Tracking
description: Verify that users can take traffic sign quizzes and their progress is tracked and displayed accurately.

steps.description: Access traffic signs quiz section
Complete a traffic signs quiz
Verify quiz results and progress indicators update appropriately
Verify progress persists across sessions

title: AI Study Chat Assistant Interaction
description: Verify that the AI chat assistant responds accurately to study-related queries and provides personalized explanations on demand.

steps.description: Open AI study chat assistant in the study room
Submit a study-related question or request for explanation
Verify the assistant provides a relevant and context-aware response
Request AI-generated quizzes or summaries from chat
Verify the AI generates valid quizzes or summaries based on user input

title: Push and Email Notifications Delivery
description: Verify that push and email notifications for study reminders, content updates, and subscription alerts are sent per user preferences.

steps.description: Set user notification preferences for push and email
Trigger events that generate notifications (e.g., subscription expiry, new content published)
Verify that push notifications are received on device if enabled
Verify that email notifications are received in the registered email if enabled

title: Admin Dashboard User Management
description: Verify that admin users can view, search, edit, and deactivate regular user accounts via the admin dashboard.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to the User Management panel in the admin dashboard
Search for a user by email or ID
Edit user details (name, roles, status)
Deactivate the user account
Verify changes are persisted and user cannot login if deactivated

title: Subscription Status Update and Cancellation
description: Verify that admin can update user subscription statuses and process cancellations, reflecting immediately in user access.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to Subscription Management in admin dashboard
Update a user's subscription status and process cancellation
Verify that user's access is restricted appropriately after cancellation

title: Audit Logging of User Actions
description: Verify that critical user and admin actions are logged correctly with timestamps and are queryable from audit logs.

steps.description: Perform key actions such as login, subscription purchase, profile update, and admin changes
Access audit logs in the admin dashboard
Verify that all performed actions are logged with correct details and timestamps

title: Session Timeout and Secure Session Management
description: Verify that user sessions are securely maintained and timeout appropriately after inactivity.

steps.description: Log in as a valid user
Remain inactive for session timeout duration configured
Verify that the user is logged out and redirected to login page
Attempt to access secured pages after timeout
Verify access is denied and login is required

title: Platform Responsive UI on Multiple Devices
description: Verify the application's UI properly adapts across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices and loads within 3 seconds under normal network conditions.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop, tablet, and mobile device simulators
Verify UI elements are properly displayed and functional in each device size
Measure page load times and verify they are under 3 seconds on each device

title: LGPD Compliance - User Data Access and Consent
description: Verify that user data is handled according to LGPD, including obtaining consent, displaying privacy policy, and allowing data export or deletion requests.

steps.description: Register a new user and accept privacy policy with explicit consent
Access user profile data export option
Verify that user can download their data in machine-readable format
Request user data deletion via profile interface
Verify that data deletion request is processed and user account is removed according to policy

title: Error Handling When Stripe Payment Fails
description: Verify that the platform handles Stripe payment failures gracefully and informs the user accurately.

steps.description: Initiate a subscription checkout using Stripe
Simulate payment failure using Stripe test cards that decline payments
Verify that user is notified of payment failure with meaningful error message
Verify that subscription is not activated and user remains on checkout page

title: Content Sharing and Community Interaction
description: Verify that users can share flashcards and study content, rate and comment on shared content, and gamification points are updated accordingly.

steps.description: Create a set of flashcards
Share flashcards with community
Login as a different user and find shared flashcards
Submit ratings and comments on shared content
Verify that ratings and comments are visible and gamification points are awarded to content creator
